summary: This is an esp replacer for Letstryagain's wonderful work on his Truly Light Elven armor that mashes it with kryptopyr and Cabal120/AMB team's work on aMidianBorn Book Of Silence - Content Addon.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][size=3][center][img]https://i.imgur.com/0m1SsSq.gif[/img][/center]Description:
[/size][/b][size=3][size=2]This is an esp replacer for Letstryagain's wonderful work on his Truly Light Elven armor that mashes it with kryptopyr and Cabal120/AMB team's work on aMidianBorn Book Of Silence - Content Addon.

[b]v3.1 and 1.1 is out:[/b] This update requires that you download the [i][b]new Main Standalone Male and Female[/b][/i] file from either pages: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82387/][b]TL Elven Armor Female [/b][/url]or [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87248/][b][size=4][size=3][size=2]TL Elven Armor Male[/size][/size][/size][/b][/url]. If you are updating from v3 to v3.1 or v1 to v1.1, there is no need to remake your bashed patches for the levelled lists as this update only changed the armor paths to the newly made wonderful male equivalent of this armor brought to us by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6960965][b]Letstryagain[/b][/url].

[b]v3.0 is out[/b]: This update brings in the changes from Summermyst v3. Remaking your Bashed patch is recommended. Please see the changes tab for more info.

[size=3][b]v2.0[/b]:[/size] Adds [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/]Frostfall[/url][/b] compatibility(Not Required). Adds not only vanilla enchantments but [size=4][size=4][size=3][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80918/][b]Summermyst[/b][/url][/size][/size][/size][/size] enchantments as well. Check the changes tab for more info.

[/size][/size][b][size=3][size=4][b][size=4][b][size=3]Features:
[/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/size][/b][size=3][size=4][size=4][size=2]The mod will add a total of [i]2[/i][i] Sets of armor[/i] that relies on the aMidianBorn Content Addon's textures and integrates it in the game the same way [/size][size=3][size=2]the [i][size=4][size=2]aMidianBorn Content Addon[/size][/size][/i] adds its new armors and compatibility in mind(Bashed patch recommended). [size=4][size=3][size=2]You can also convert the Vanilla Elven armor pieces and [i][size=4][size=2]aMidianBorn Content Addon[/size][/size] [/i]armor pieces into their [i]Truly Light[/i] pieces.[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=3][size=2] For a fuller list of features, please see the Changes tab.[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][b][size=3][size=4][b][size=4][b][size=3][size=2]
[/size][/size][/b][/size]
Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909][size=3]aMidianBorn Book of Silence Content Addon[/size][/url] [/b][size=2]
and all its requirements - install instructions [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=2678959]here [/url]->[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=2678959] Book of Silence - Content Addon[/url][/size][b]
[size=2]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605]Cabal120/AMB Team[/url] and [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4291352][size=2]kryptopyr [/size][/url]

[/b][size=2][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82387/]Truly Light Elven Armor Standalone (Female)[/url][/size]
or [/size][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87248/]Truly Light Elven Armor Standalone (Male)[/url][size=4][size=2]
standalone version[/size][size=3] Male and Female [size=2]main file[/size][/size][b][size=3][size=2]
by [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6960965][size=2]Letstryagain[/size][/url][/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][/size]
Required for v2.0 and above
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80918/]Summermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim[/url]
[/size][/b][size=2]by [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191][b][size=3][size=2]EnaiSiaion[/size][/size][/b][/url][b][size=3]

Not Required, Highly Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/]Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival[/url]
[/size][/b][size=2]by [/size][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/187943][size=2][size=4][size=2]Chesko[/size][/size][/size][/url][size=3]

**Installation:[/size][/b][/size][list=1]
[*][size=2]Down and Install aMidianBorn Book of Silence Content Addon and its requirements, follow instructions from here: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showtopic=2678959]Book of Silence - Content Addon.[/url][/size]
[*][size=2]Download and Install Truly Light Elven Armor (female) version 1.4SA (StandAlone).[/size]
[*][size=2]Download and install this mod, accept when asked to overwrite 'LTAJC_LightElvenArmor.esp'[/size][size=2].[/size]
[*][size=2]Ensure that [i]amidianBorn_ContentAddon.esp[/i](above) and [i]LTAJC_LightElvenArmor.esp[/i](below) is activated in your load order.[/size]
[*][size=2]Done.[/size]

[/list][size=4][size=2]Why not check out my other patches:[/size][/size][size=4][size=3][size=4][size=3][size=1]please[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83419/][b][size=2]aMidianBorn BookOfSilence - Frostfall - Summermyst[/size][/b]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/thumbnails/83334-0-1492514204.jpg[/img][/url][/size]

[/size][/b][/size]
[/size][/b][/size][size=4][size=2][b]Personal Note:[/b]
Hi guys! I've been creating patches for some time now and this is my first time being in a modding community. It really feels so good that you guys take the time to download and try my patches out so I wanted to say thank you so much! I know that this should be enough though it helps even more that you leave an endorsement because it reminds me that I did something right and you liked the patch. also comments.[b]
Permissions:[/b]
[/size][size=2]You cannot ask me for permission to any of the assets this plugin makes use of as it is only permitted to be here as the authors of these mods allowed it. You will have to ask them for permission but you are free to edit this plugin only to your liking.[/size][b]
[/b][/size]Credits:
[b]Huge thanks[/b] to these people and other awesome mod authors that make our game a great experience! So don't forget to leave an endorsement, kudos and comments to your favorite modders that helped your game get brighter! This gives us more inspiration to keep modding the game for you!
jinncrazey - awesome redditor
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6960965]Letstryagain[/url] for allowing me to create this[size=4][size=2]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/571605]Cabal120/AMB team[/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4291352]kryptopyr[/url] for their work on the aMidianBorn Content Addon and allowing me to re-open the files even after faulting them twice.
ElminsterAU, Hlp, Zilav and Sharlikran for XEdit
Mator for Automation Tools
matortheeternal, FiftyTifty, Zilav, turulo, Treplos, DanielUA for MergePlugins standalone
Unofficial patches team
SkyUI, SKSE, ENBoost
Bethesda [/size][/size]
author: jchernandez

files.name: aMidianBorn Book Of Silence - Truly Light Elven (F)
files.fileName: aMidianBorn Book Of Silence - Truly Light Elven (F)-83149-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
AMB - Truly Light Elven Armor
-added a second set for AMB Thalmor Elven texture, both sets made consistent with WAFR and AMB-CA changes.
-added both truly light sets without and with vanilla enchantments into their respective levelled lists(Bashed patch recommended).
-Recipes with CCOR compatibility including racial craft restrictions (Thalmor only HighElf)
Breakdown recipes at the Smelter (CCOR toggled) with PRUFEI(Protection for Recipes Using Favorited and Equipped Items) conditions.
Convert recipes available at the Tanning rack (CCOR armorlight recipes toggled). When you have a Vanilla Elven/AMB Thalmor armor pieces in your inventory the recipes will show in the tanning rack so you can 'remodel' them into their equivalent Truly Light pieces.

files.name: aMidianBorn Book Of Silence - Truly Light Elven (F)
files.fileName: aMidianBorn Book Of Silence - Truly Light Elven (F)-83149-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Forwarded changes with Summermyst v3:
-Added Cushioned enchantment to Boot pieces.
-forwarded the fixes to Helmet Lists and added missing Helmet pieces.
-forwarded the fixes to Boot Lists and added new Rollback enchantment.

files.name: aMidianBorn BookOfSilence - Truly Light Elven M and F
files.fileName: aMidianBorn BookOfSilence - Truly Light Elven M and F-83149-3-1.7z
files.changelogHtml: -Forwarded changes to the latest version of the mod allowing the previously only-female armor changes to have the new TL Elven armor Male version. No levelled lists changes, remaking bashed patch when updating from v3 is not required.

files.name: aMidianBorn BookOfSilence - Truly Light Elven M and F
files.fileName: aMidianBorn BookOfSilence - Truly Light Elven M and F-83149-1-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
-Added out-of-the-box values for Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival. All pieces will give the same Warmth and Coverage values as its vanilla equivalents.
-Forwarded changes to the latest version of the mod allowing the previously only-female armor changes to have the new TL Elven armor Male version. No levelled lists changes, remaking bashed patch when updating from v1 is not required.
